column2:
"That's great!
Now I can resume offering soup.
Take this as a token of my thanks."

"You won't believe how many people are clamoring
for my Rockbear soup. They were pushing each
other and cutting in line. We almost had a riot!"

"Anyway, it's got to simmer for a long time,
so I'd better get to work."

"よかったー！
これでスープの提供を再開できるわ。
これ、お礼に取っておいてね。"

"もうロックベアスープはまだかって
大騒ぎになってるんだから！"

"仕込むのにも時間がかかるし。
早く準備を始めなきゃ！"
